basics.name: gBoole01
basics.label: Full Stack Developer
basics.summary: Passionate developer with expertise in new technologies and Opquast certification, equipped with managerial skills. Enjoys implementing and maintaining good development practices. Also places great importance on web quality.

work.name: Mon courtier énergie
work.summary: I facilitated the transformation of Salesforce data to enhance the digital customer experience. Concurrently, I manage AWS operations and maintain company websites, ensuring seamless functionality and performance across divisions.
highlights: Transformed Salesforce company data using the MERN stack to enhance the digital customer experience.
Implemented DevOps practices for improved observability and automation.
Managed AWS operations and maintained company websites, ensuring seamless functionality and performance.

work.name: Kaizen Agency
work.summary: Led maintenance and feature development for a restaurant booking application and CRM system utilizing the MEAN stack, while implementing CQRS pattern upgrades for a Prestashop website and developing custom modules for CMS websites across various industries.
highlights: Maintenance and development of new features for a restaurant booking application and CRM system in JavaScript (MEAN stack)
Upgraded a Prestashop website (1.7) and its dedicated modules using the CQRS pattern (referral, presentation of wineries, private sales, etc.)
Maintenance and development of PrestaShop modules on various e-commerce websites
Maintenance and development of WordPress modules on different websites (real estate group, merchants, etc.)

work.name: Agence Bonbay
work.summary: Crafted a responsive and reactive user interface for real-time sports competition tracking software and customized WordPress modules, optimizing user experience and administrative efficiency for a sports association website.
highlights: Developed a PHP/JavaScript application for real-time tracking of sports competition results
Developed WordPress modules for a sports association website, including user profile creation, membership management, and license payment

work.name: McDonald's
work.summary: Demonstrated strong leadership and organizational skills while overseeing daily operations, ensuring optimal customer service and team efficiency in a fast-paced environment.
highlights: Training, motivating, and supervising a team
Managing restaurant openings and closings
Ensuring product and service quality
Ensuring customer satisfaction
Ensuring process compliance
Ensuring the cleanliness of the restaurant

projects.name: Personal Website
projects.description: This is my personal website built with Next.js as a static site generator. It uses Markdown files to publish various content such as blog posts, projects, kata solutions, resume, and includes a contact form.
highlights: Utilized Next.js as a static site generator (SSG)
Implemented Markdown file-based content management for publishing blog posts, projects, kata solutions, resume, etc.
Included a contact form for visitors to reach out

projects.name: Job Scraper
projects.description: This project is a Job Scraper developed using JavaScript, Node.js, and Puppeteer. It automates job search by scraping job listings from various websites and consolidating them into a single JSON file.
highlights: Automated job search on Indeed and LinkedIn for 'Web Developer' positions in Bordeaux and remote within France
Generated a JSON file containing all job listings collected within the last 7 days

projects.name: Blog API
projects.description: This project is a Blog API developed using TypeScript and Express. It allows users to publish articles in an authenticated manner and read articles from other authors.
highlights: Implemented user authentication and article publication functionality
Utilized TypeScript for strong typing and Express framework for server-side development

projects.name: Favourite Dishes App
projects.description: This project is a Favourite Dishes application developed using TypeScript and React with Redux for state management and MaterialUI for the user interface. It allows users to reference and rate restaurants and their dishes.
highlights: Implemented functionality for users to add a restaurant to the list
Implemented functionality for users to add a dish to a restaurant

projects.name: Chat App
projects.description: This project is a Chat App developed using TypeScript, Node.js, Express, Socket.io, React, Bootstrap, and UUID. It enables users to communicate with their contacts by adding them, creating conversations, and sending/receiving messages.
highlights: Implemented functionality for users to add contacts
Developed features allowing users to create conversations with one or multiple contacts
Enabled real-time messaging capabilities for users within conversations using websockets

projects.name: Countries API
projects.description: This project is a REST API developed using PHP and Symfony. It provides endpoints to retrieve information about countries, including a route to fetch all countries and another route to get details about a specific country based on its ISO code.
highlights: Implemented endpoints to retrieve information about countries
Utilized Symfony and API Platform for rapid API development

projects.name: Calculator
projects.description: This project is a Calculator application developed using TypeScript and React with Vite as the build tool. It features a classic calculator interface and utilizes the React hook `useReducer()` for state management.
highlights: Implemented functionality to display digits on the calculator as they are entered
Developed the ability to handle operations, showing the entered digits above and waiting for new input
Enabled calculation results to be displayed when the equals button is pressed

projects.name: Hangman Game
projects.description: This project is a Hangman Game application developed using TypeScript and React with Vite as the build tool. The game allows users to relax and enjoy the classic 'Hangman' game.
highlights: Random word selection from a dictionary at the start of each new game
Display of correctly guessed letters within the word
Drawing of a new part of the hangman for each incorrect guess, leading to game over when the drawing is complete

projects.name: Multistep Form
projects.description: This project is a Multistep Form application developed using TypeScript and React with Vite as the build tool. The form allows users to enter their personal information in a step-by-step manner, avoiding long forms that might discourage users.
highlights: Implemented a 3-step form: 'Account', 'User', 'Postal Address'
Each step is a separate React component, maintaining the overall form state

projects.name: Project Management App
projects.description: This project is a Project Management App developed using JavaScript, Node.js, Express, Mongoose, React, React Router, GraphQL, and Bootstrap. It allows users to centralize client information and manage project planning effectively.
highlights: Developed functionality for users to add clients and associate projects with clients
Implemented features to modify the status of projects as they progress
Utilized a combination of technologies including Node.js, Express, Mongoose, React, and GraphQL

projects.name: Note Taking App
projects.description: This project is a Note Taking application developed using TypeScript and React with Bootstrap for the user interface. It allows users to centralize and manage their notes efficiently.
highlights: Implemented note creation and storage in the user's browser
Added functionality to tag notes for better organization
Enabled searching notes by name or tags

projects.name: Rock Paper Scissors Game
projects.description: This project is a simple Rock Paper Scissors game developed using JavaScript and Vite. It allows users to play the classic game against the computer.
highlights: Implemented functionality for users to play Rock Paper Scissors against the computer

projects.name: Snake Game
projects.description: This project is a simple Snake game developed using JavaScript and Vite. It allows users to play the classic Snake game.
highlights: Implemented functionality for users to play Snake

projects.name: Speed Typing Game
projects.description: This project is a speed typing game developed using JavaScript and Vite. It allows users to test their typing speed by typing a randomly fetched quote from the 'Quotable' API.
highlights: Implemented functionality for users to test their typing speed
Utilized the 'Quotable' API to fetch random quotes
Incorporated a timer to measure typing speed
Provided visual cues to quickly identify typing errors

projects.name: Weather App
projects.description: This project is a weather application developed using JavaScript and Vite. It allows users to check the upcoming weather forecast by fetching data from the Open Weather API.
highlights: Implemented functionality for users to check the weather forecast
Utilized the Open Weather API to fetch weather data
Utilized Axios for making HTTP requests
